main event: A witness observed a bright light that appeared to hover and then rapidly move eastward before landing and reappearing behind a tree.
interesting points: The object was reported to have moved rapidly and hovered at times., The witness estimated the object's speed to be roughly 500 MPH., The object was described as having a color similar to gold with a flickering red light., The sky was clear at the time of the sighting., The witness was a 15-year-old male who reported the sighting to Project Blue Book.
